website_summaries.verdict: A nicely constructed zip line by a brand known for prompt customer service. Affordable, but you have to purchase a seat separately.
pros: Stands out for being very easy to set up, with clear, detailed instructions
A good choice for beginners and those with some experience
cons: Experienced users may be disappointed that it only has 60 feet of zip line

customer_reviews.title: The kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: Price was great, high quality (for kids, not suitable for adults) but beware, the rubber mulch to put under a zip line will cost you $300! 😂
customer_reviews.author: James Nyazai

customer_reviews.title: ... the 60 foot zip line and our kids absolutely love it. One of the bearings broke after two ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought the 60 foot zip line and our kids absolutely love it. One of the bearings broke after two weeks and Jhon responded to my email within ten minutes on a Sunday night and had a new bearing to me in two days! He is also sending a couple of extra bearings for my peace of mind even though he assured me the problem won’t happen again. We are very happy with the product and especially impressed with the company’s willingness to go above and beyond with their customer service. I highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Larsen

customer_reviews.title: We LOVE our Zip Line
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE our Zip Line!!! The kids were so excited to get this and my husband was able to put it together in no time at all. We were a little worried that the line would cut into the tree trunk so we placed a folded towel in between the tree and the cord. I'm sure there is a better way to do this but it didn't seem to harm the towel or the tree. I definitely recommend this product, it really brings a lot of fun and laughter and quality play with your family.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: It’s great!
customer_reviews.text: The kids love it! I only wish it was longer. They have so much fun with it!
customer_reviews.author: Kris D

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly. Was exactly as described. Easy set up. Everyone loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa J. Dirlam

customer_reviews.title: Great product, not so great instructions
customer_reviews.text: The zip line works great. My son loves it. It was fairly simple to install, but it absolutely takes longer than 5 minutes, which the box says is all it takes, to put up. The instructions are a little convoluted and poorly edited, making it more difficult to install, which is why it lost a star. Overall great product, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: ahosey

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son's birthday and was able to get it about 80-90% installed by myself. But to really get the tension right an extra set or two of hands is very helpful. My son LOVES the zip line. I purchased the a seat separately but my son prefers to use it just by hanging onto the trolley handlebars because then he feels "like a spy". Very well made with easy instructions. Will buy from this company again when he gets a bit older and is ready for a longer run.
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: kids love this
customer_reviews.text: We have had this for 3 months and my kids still race out the door to zipline across the yard. We did build a platform for the kids to kick off of because our kids are so small (my 9 year old is as tall as my 7 year old). This has been sturdy. Only wish there was an attached string to pull it back (this is again probably just because my kids are so small. We just put a dog leash on so we don't have to constantly pull the pulley back to the platform.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: I definitely recommend this Zipline
customer_reviews.text: We have become the house all the neighborhood kids want to come play at because of this Zipline. Very easy to install and perfect to keep my kids moving as they keep going for more
customer_reviews.author: Quinn

customer_reviews.title: I'm impressed, my son loves it!
customer_reviews.text: So I was impressed with how quick the setup is. We don't have much room in the backyard and only 1 small tree. So we attached it to the side of our shed and to the small tree. My 6 year old loves it he had a blast. Kept him entertained for hours. My 19 year old daughter said it looked like so much fun she wanted to try it. It was definitely with the money and it would make any kid happy!
customer_reviews.author: Dahlia

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: It was a bit difficult to install mainly to get it tight enough not too have slack once her weight was on it. After getting it installed my daughter loved it. It is a bit short though. After 2 weeks we went to the hardware store and purchased a longer cable and switched it out.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Heuser

customer_reviews.title: Best Zipline Ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent zip line. Good instructions. I only struggled because I’m one person putting up- realistically you should have 2 adults but I managed to figure out by myself. Just had to incorporate using lawn tractor to put tensions on line to tighten final 3 locking bolts. My kids are loving it & will for a long time. We might even add a second one....
customer_reviews.author: Violet Gray

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend!
customer_reviews.text: We put this zip line up for the kiddos and couldn't refrain from trying it ourselves! We all have a blast on it. It is definitely durable to be able to hold all the weight that's been hanging on it. Great buy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: My son and his cousin LOVE the zipline! It's used for so many adventures :) Sturdy and definitely seems like it will last!
customer_reviews.author: ccxthree

customer_reviews.title: Very well put together
customer_reviews.text: They have a guide based on the height of your user- overall, it's very well thought out and the materials are sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Cowan

customer_reviews.title: Buy a different product
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product. Very difficult to install. Emailed the company and they never responded. It stops abruptly and my son actually got hurt this morning. I recommend against this product.
customer_reviews.author: Rajsmith

customer_reviews.title: Super High Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Its a sturdy and well made zipline. Not so simple to install but once it's in the kids are busy on it for hours on end.
customer_reviews.author: DG

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: Kids love it! Takes 2-3 people to get it right.
customer_reviews.author: Dukeslsu

customer_reviews.title: CTSC 60’ Zip Line Kit
customer_reviews.text: Great product at a good price. Works great with 60lbs kid.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Phenomenal Support
customer_reviews.text: Phenomenal support and a great product. Included sling was slightly too small for my anchor tree and they promptly made and shipped a custom sling!
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you have two trees or sturdy posts!
customer_reviews.text: It took a lot longer to put together and set up than it said in the ad and on the box. The box said setup time was 5mins. It took us several hours because we didnt have two trees and had to bury posts on one end...but even if there had been two trees it still would have taken every bit of an hour.
customer_reviews.author: Lara J.

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Great directions.
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful customer service! And great product and directions. This product included great directions for installation.
customer_reviews.author: JAYMEE

customer_reviews.title: Bearing in trolley didn't last
customer_reviews.text: Included necessary components, relatively easy install, bearing in trolley went bad after first weekend of use, not super happy about that!
customer_reviews.author: F Gurnee

customer_reviews.title: Study and fun!
customer_reviews.text: There’s my son on this zip line. They all love it and it held up me and my biggest brother uncle JuJu.
customer_reviews.author: Sam and Nia

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to install, but it's worth it at the end
customer_reviews.author: Victor jaguar

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great and ththe handles are big with lots of grippers for a good hold. Lots of fun!
customer_reviews.author: katjones

customer_reviews.title: Easy to setup, great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Works great and was actually pretty easy to setup. Make sure your starting tree is strong though. The best part, however, was that the seller is actually making us a different sling wire to go around the starter tree so it’ll fit our tree! That’s customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Christina G. Keitel

customer_reviews.title: Super fun!
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to install. It is a little hard to get on and off of for bigger people but for agile children it’s great.
customer_reviews.author: Neale E

customer_reviews.title: Great present for kids and adults!!
customer_reviews.text: Great setup and perfect length for first one. We are going to get another longer one next!
customer_reviews.author: Melisa West

customer_reviews.title: Good for young kids
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up. Kids love it. Supports my weight also but probably best just for kids.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!
customer_reviews.text: My grandkids are having a wonderful time on their new zip line!
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Powers

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put together, also need some muscle to tighten the screw while holding the line.
customer_reviews.author: Mo B

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and fun!
customer_reviews.text: Our granddaughters love the zip line. It’s sturdy and so much fun.
customer_reviews.author: David T. Nadolski

customer_reviews.title: Awesome fun for the kids.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Worth every penny. It also holds me and I weight 170 lbs
customer_reviews.author: Gustavo P.

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: We have not had it up for long. But, my kids love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Agans

customer_reviews.title: Great Zip Line !
customer_reviews.text: Thank you,... your zip line is very simple and quick to set up. The zipping is awesome,.. my kids love it. Thank you for the very quick reply when I had a question on the installation. Jhon is the best zip line go to guy in the world! Thank you my kids got the zip line as a last day of school surprise. They said "No you didn't",...and zipped and zipped with big ZIPPY SMILEs ! I feel confident and safe on this Zip line, thank you..if my wife is good with this zip line then you should be GREAT with it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tons of fun!
customer_reviews.text: I did have some difficulty in setting this up with the parts provided. But I contacted the maker, who took care of it immediately by sending me a better part. Setup can be daunting if you haven't done it before (I hadn't) but by my third time taking it down and trying again to get the slack out, I was a pro. We used the pin/bolt on the handlebar assembly to attach a hanging disc swing seat, which makes the kids feel safer.
customer_reviews.author: PKMetal

customer_reviews.title: Best investment since my divorce attorney!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing! Took me an hour to assemble (I have 2 large trees). Did it Christmas Eve night by flashlight. Kids found it next morning and have been on it for 3 hours straight. **It does not come with a spring brake which I highly recommend getting.
customer_reviews.author: J. Boice

customer_reviews.title: Unique gift
customer_reviews.text: Grandson’s 5th birthday - very pleased + his older brother was able to enjoy as well Nice to be able to use in backyard @ anytime rather than a trip to the park
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy well made product
customer_reviews.text: It makes it dim much easier for kids to be able to alternate between sitting and standing. It is a very well made product d as bd very pleased
customer_reviews.author: marsha L.

customer_reviews.title: Great investment for the summer of cancellations and lockdown
customer_reviews.text: Easier than I thought to install. You definitely need 2 adults to install this. But, the directions are clear and easy to follow.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great birthday gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my nephew and now we can't get him off of it.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha ammerman

product_meta.title: CTSC 60 Foot Zip Line Kit for Kids and Adult(Less Then 250lb), Ziplines for Backyards
product_meta.description:
Here’s An Amazing Way To Become Your Neighbourhood’s Coolest Parent!

Don’t you want to spend quality time with your kids?

Are you looking for safe and fun ways to encourage outdoor activities for your children?

You can finally turn your backyard into a magical amusement park effortlessly!

Presenting The CTSC Ultimate Children’s Zip Line Kit, The Safest & Most Durable Outdoor Entertainment Set Available On Amazon!

Now you can become your child’s superhero by giving them this mind-blowing backyard zip line swing set!

Designed with safety and comfort in mind, our premium zipline starter’s kit will allow your kids to spend endless hours of gliding fun in the comfort of your backyard!

When It Comes To Your Children, Safety Is Our Top Priority!

Our ultimate zipline cable set has been tested to meet strict CE and RoHS quality and safety certifications, so you can rest assured that your children will be 100% protected!

In addition, we have utilized sturdy accessories, such as galvanized steel cables and non-slip grip handles to ensure maximum comfort and safety!

Save Time & Effort With Our Comprehensive Installation Guide!

Even if you are not a handy person, you can effortlessly install this high-quality zip line bundle due to the simple and efficient installation guide!

Plus, just to make your life easier, we have pre-assembled the trolley!

Still Not Convinced? – Here’s What You Get!

 Steel trolley with sealed ball-bearing pulleys

 60 ft main cable

 7ft sling cable

 U clamps and Turnbuckle 

 Instruction book

Why Spend Another Boring Day Indoors? This Zipline Set Will Guarantee Hours Of Outdoor Fun!

Indulge Yourself! Click “Add To Cart” Now!
feature_bullets: SAFETY COMES FIRST: This zip line meets the international quality standards (rohs & ce). Weight limit: 250 lbs. Come with 7 foot sling cable and 60 foot main cable.
PERFECT GIFT IDEA FOR KIDS: Your backyard will instantly become a stunning amusement park, and you will become the neighbourhood’s coolest parent and your child will remember for a lifetime!
EASY TO ASSEMBLE: Thanks to the comprehensive, step-by-step instructions included. Even if you are not a handyman, you can still effortlessly set up this zip line easily!

CONVENIENCE FOR YOUR CHILD: This zip line is specifically designed for kids- non-slippery rubber grips help riders keep a firm hold on the zip line while playing. The 60 foot galvanized stell cable make our zip line Tough and Durable!

10-YEAR LIMITED WARRANTY,ENJOY HAPPY FAMILY MOMENTS FOR YEARS TO COME!- Designed by loving parents,our ctsc durable kid’s zipline kits is the ideal way to make your kids smile. You will absolutely blow their minds with this fantastic gift idea! However, if for any reason you are not 100% satisfied with this zip line kit, you can always return it with a full refund in 30 days! Please don't hesitate to contact us First if ever a problem should arise,we'll do our best to help solve it!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars131 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
